name: The Many Short-Lived Adventures of a Box
name_original: The Many Short-Lived Adventures of a Box
description:
Upgrade your abilities with every loop to reach the goal!

WASD/Arrows to move
Space/Up to jump
Shift to dash
Collect keys to open doors

Music & programming by Criobite
Level design by Atikyne

Made in 72 hours during Ludum Dare 51
